mapper.update: update t_recipes set pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, materials = #{materials,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, steps = #{steps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, typeid = #{typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, pic, title, materials, steps, content, uid, createtime, typeid from t_recipes
